description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Wordsearch Rush is a wordsearch game like no other. It adds some unique twists on a classic genre to keep the game fresh and well paced.  Are you ready for the rush?
